scripts.dev: sh -ac '[ -f ../../.env.local ] && dotenv -e ../../.env.local -- next dev --turbopack || next dev --turbopack'
scripts.build: sh -ac '[ -f ../../.env.local ] && dotenv -e ../../.env.local -- next build || next build'
scripts.start: sh -ac '[ -f ../../.env.local ] && dotenv -e ../../.env.local -- next start || next start'
